name: part_007
file: tmp_【３D】ライブも企画も！誕生日祭だーー！！！！【 #大神ミオ誕生日 】 [ChMwx4yeI3g]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Ookami Mio, Nekomata Okayu, Inugami Korone, and Oozora Subaru perform 'Ochame Kinou' (Fukkireta).
A floating cake appears and flies away, leading the group to chase after it.
The group returns to the room, discusses their chase, and talks about an upcoming original song project.

subtitles.original: いつでも I love you. 君に Take 2 Kiss me.
subtitles.english: Always, I love you. Take 2 kiss me for you.

subtitles.original: 忘れられないから 僕の大事なメモリー
subtitles.english: Because I can't forget, my precious memory.

subtitles.original: どら焼きは 主食になれない ならば上書きしちゃえば 僕の思い通り
subtitles.english: Dorayaki can't be a staple food, so if I overwrite it, it'll be just as I want.

subtitles.original: 可愛いたしなみの音 合図で音速に
subtitles.english: The sound of cute manners, reaching sonic speed at the signal.

subtitles.original: 触るなんて 気にしるからにきまってんじゃん
subtitles.english: If you touch me, of course I'll be conscious of it.

subtitles.original: それでも信じて 幸せになるように 礼儀正しく まずはささいな挨拶からから アイレニ
subtitles.english: Even so, believe, so we can be happy, be polite, starting with a small greeting, 'Ai-re-ni'.

subtitles.original: いつでも I love you. 君に Take 2 Kiss me.
subtitles.english: Always, I love you. Take 2 kiss me for you.

subtitles.original: 忘れられないから 僕の大事なメモリー
subtitles.english: Because I can't forget, my precious memory.

subtitles.original: どら焼きは 主食になれない ならば
subtitles.english: Dorayaki can't be a staple food, so...

subtitles.original: 上書きしちゃえば 僕の思い通り
subtitles.english: ...if I overwrite it, it'll be just as I want.

subtitles.original: 夢からピピピさめないで さめないで ぬくもり逃げないで
subtitles.english: Please don't wake up from the dream, don't wake up, don't let the warmth escape.

subtitles.original: まだあと５分 いや１０分待たせて
subtitles.english: Wait for another 5 minutes, no, 10 minutes.

subtitles.original: １００年後続くなら 約束圧縮して
subtitles.english: If it continues for 100 years, compress the promise.

subtitles.original: 待ち構えるから 勘違いのテキパキテキ
subtitles.english: Because I'll be waiting, a misunderstanding 'tekipaki-teki'.

subtitles.original: ストローの加え方 少しは違うでしょう
subtitles.english: The way you hold the straw is a bit different, right?

subtitles.original: 見て見ぬふりされた 世界が爆発しちゃう
subtitles.english: Ignored by everyone, the world is going to explode.

subtitles.original: 助手席に乗り出す でもすぐに凹みだす 可憐な暴走 誰か止めてよ
subtitles.english: Lean out of the passenger seat, but immediately get depressed, a lovely rampage, someone stop it.

subtitles.original: 待って待ってベイベー ぶつかればまた新しい 知識発掘
subtitles.english: Wait wait baby, if we collide, it's new knowledge excavation,

subtitles.original: でも力尽きてしまえばそこまで オーマイガー
subtitles.english: but if I run out of strength, that's it, Oh My God.

subtitles.original: いつでも I love you. 君に Take 2 Kiss me.
subtitles.english: Always, I love you. Take 2 kiss me for you.

subtitles.original: お星様に願い事 叶えてくれますか
subtitles.english: Will you grant my wish to the stars?

subtitles.original: 地球の裏側まで 僕を運んで 一番綺麗な 花探しに行くんだ
subtitles.english: Carry me to the other side of the earth, I'm going to look for the most beautiful flower.

subtitles.original: まだ君の熱い想いは 想いは 頬に伝う涙
subtitles.english: Your hot feelings are still, the tears running down your cheeks.

subtitles.original: 雫は胸に包んで 届けるよ 空に
subtitles.english: I'll wrap the droplets in my heart and deliver them to the sky.

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: フー！
subtitles.english: Whoo!

subtitles.original: ヤッホー！
subtitles.english: Yahoo!

subtitles.original: どっかー可愛い！
subtitles.english: So cute!

subtitles.original: 可愛い！
subtitles.english: Cute!

subtitles.original: 宇宙一可愛い！
subtitles.english: Cutest in the universe!

subtitles.original: お誕生日！
subtitles.english: Birthday!

subtitles.original: ケーキも吸い込んじゃうからね！
subtitles.english: I'll even inhale the cake!

subtitles.original: ヤッホーー！
subtitles.english: Yahoooo!

subtitles.original: お腹空いた！
subtitles.english: I'm hungry!

subtitles.original: そろそろ始まるんじゃない？
subtitles.english: Isn't it starting soon?

subtitles.original: オスバで行くぞー！
subtitles.english: Let's go with O-Suba!

subtitles.original: ラストスパート行くぞ！
subtitles.english: Let's go for the last spurt!

subtitles.original: いつでも I love you. 君に Take 2 Kiss me.
subtitles.english: Always, I love you. Take 2 kiss me for you.

subtitles.original: 地球の裏側まで 僕を運んで 一番綺麗な 花探しに行くんだ
subtitles.english: Carry me to the other side of the earth, I'm going to look for the most beautiful flower.

subtitles.original: まだ君の熱い想いは 想いは 頬に伝う涙
subtitles.english: Your hot feelings are still, the tears running down your cheeks.

subtitles.original: 雫は胸に包んで 届けるよ 空に
subtitles.english: I'll wrap the droplets in my heart and deliver them to the sky.

subtitles.original: いつでも I love you. 君に Take 2 Kiss me.
subtitles.english: Always, I love you. Take 2 kiss me for you.

subtitles.original: 忘れられないから 僕の大事なメモリー
subtitles.english: Because I can't forget, my precious memory.

subtitles.original: どら焼きは 主食になれない ならば
subtitles.english: Dorayaki can't be a staple food, so...

subtitles.original: 上書きしちゃえば 僕の思い通り
subtitles.english: ...if I overwrite it, it'll be just as I want.

subtitles.original: 夢からピピピさめないで さめないで ぬくもり逃げないで
subtitles.english: Please don't wake up from the dream, don't wake up, don't let the warmth escape.

subtitles.original: まだあと５分 いや１０分待たせて
subtitles.english: Wait for another 5 minutes, no, 10 minutes.

subtitles.original: わあ！
subtitles.english: Wow!

subtitles.original: え？
subtitles.english: Eh?

subtitles.original: 何？
subtitles.english: What?

subtitles.original: ケーキだ！ケーキだ！
subtitles.english: A cake! A cake!

subtitles.original: ケーキだ！え、浮いてる！浮いてる！
subtitles.english: It's a cake! Eh, it's floating! It's floating!

subtitles.original: あ、あ、待って！待って！
subtitles.english: Ah, ah, wait! Wait!

subtitles.original: 行っちゃった。
subtitles.english: It's gone.

subtitles.original: え、追いかける？
subtitles.english: Eh, should we chase it?

subtitles.original: あ、そうだね。追いかけよう。
subtitles.english: Ah, right. Let's chase it.

subtitles.original: 行こう！コロネ、待って！
subtitles.english: Let's go! Korone, wait!

subtitles.original: コロさんいなかったね。
subtitles.english: Koro-san wasn't there.

subtitles.original: いなかった。
subtitles.english: She wasn't.

subtitles.original: 結構全力で追いかけたんだけど。
subtitles.english: We chased after her with all our might.

subtitles.original: ねえ。
subtitles.english: Yeah.

subtitles.original: コロネ早かった。
subtitles.english: Korone was fast.

subtitles.original: やっぱ足は違う。これでも追いつかなかった。
subtitles.english: Her legs are just different after all. Even with this, we couldn't catch up.

subtitles.original: これでも猫は？
subtitles.english: Even so, as a cat?

subtitles.original: 猫無理だよ。
subtitles.english: It's impossible for a cat.

subtitles.original: なんで猫に諦めてんだよ。
subtitles.english: Why are you giving up on being a cat?

subtitles.original: 猫無理。
subtitles.english: Cat impossible.

subtitles.original: 頑張れよ。
subtitles.english: Do your best.

subtitles.original: 猫無理だよ。
subtitles.english: It's impossible for a cat.

subtitles.original: そんなことないだろ。
subtitles.english: That's not true.

subtitles.original: 無理だよ。
subtitles.english: It's impossible.

subtitles.original: お前顔どうなってんだよ。
subtitles.english: What's up with your face?

subtitles.original: 絶望してた今。
subtitles.english: I was despairing just now.

subtitles.original: 自分が犬じゃなかったということに絶望した。
subtitles.english: I despaired over the fact that I wasn't a dog.

subtitles.original: あ、そういうこと。
subtitles.english: Ah, I see.

subtitles.original: 猫も可愛いから大丈夫だよ。
subtitles.english: Cats are cute too, so it's okay.

subtitles.original: 本当？
subtitles.english: Really?

subtitles.original: 可愛い可愛い。
subtitles.english: Cute, cute.

subtitles.original: じゃあいいかも猫で。
subtitles.english: Then maybe it's fine being a cat.

subtitles.original: 何の話してんだよ。
subtitles.english: What are you talking about?

subtitles.original: あ、そういえばこの３人といえばさ。
subtitles.english: Ah, speaking of these three.

subtitles.original: こないだやったさ、歌詞決めオリジナル曲のさ、３人でもあるよね。
subtitles.english: We are also the three who did that original song with the lyrics we decided the other day.

subtitles.original: そうだね。
subtitles.english: That's right.

subtitles.original: ０デシベル先生、よろしくお願いします。
subtitles.english: 0-decibel sensei, please.

subtitles.original: 猫先生です、よろしくお願いします。
subtitles.english: I'm Neko sensei, please.

subtitles.original: お二人に歌詞を考えていただいたオリジナル楽曲。
subtitles.english: An original song with lyrics thought up by these two.

subtitles.original: ちょっと今日発表しちゃおうかなーって思っててさ。
subtitles.english: I thought I'd announce it today.

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!
